name: Rain of Pain
description:
Dodge a bunch of bad things, collect a bunch of good things!

This project was designed for demonstrational purposes. I will be teaching a friend, and perhaps future prospective game developers, the throes of game development and working with Unity using this project. But it's a working prototype that's actually kind of fun to play, so here you go!

Controls:

  • Move Left: A or Left Arrow Right or Left Joystick
  • Move Right: D or Right Arrow Key or Left Joystick
  • Exit Game: Esc
